Title: Talk to the Hand
Plot: Dexter finds that in order to catch the Doomsday Killers, he must create a macabre tableau of his own; Debra's battle with LaGuerta over the case of the dead call girl boils over, and her therapist makes an unnerving suggestion.
GuestStars: Geoff Pierson, Aimee Garcia, Billy Brown, Josh Cooke, Kyle Davis, Jordana Spiro, Rya Kihlstedt
